   19: %%
   20: 
   21: %% Test suite for erlang:decode_packet/3
   22: 
   23: -module(decode_packet_SUITE).
   24: 
   25: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   26: 
   27: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,
   28:          init_per_testcase/2,end_per_testcase/2,
   29:          basic/1, packet_size/1, neg/1, http/1, line/1, ssl/1, otp_8536/1,
   30:          otp_9389/1, otp_9389_line/1]).
   31: 
   32: suite() ->
   33:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   34:      {timetrap, {minutes, 1}}].
   35: 
   36: all() -> 
   37:     [basic, packet_size, neg, http, line, ssl, otp_8536,
   38:      otp_9389, otp_9389_line].
   39: 
   40: groups() -> 
   41:     [].
   42: 
   43: init_per_testcase(Func, Config) when is_atom(Func), is_list(Config) ->
   44:     rand:seed(exsplus),
   45:     io:format("*** SEED: ~p ***\n", [rand:export_seed()]),
   46:     Config.
   47: 
   48: end_per_testcase(_Func, _Config) ->
   49:     ok.
   50: 
   51: basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   52:     Packet = <<101,22,203,54,175>>,
   53:     Rest = <<123,34,0,250>>,
   54:     Bin = <<Packet/binary,Rest/binary>>,
   55:     {ok, Bin, <<>>} = decode_pkt(raw,Bin),
   56: 
   57:     {more, 5+1} = decode_pkt(1,<<5,1,2,3,4>>),
   58:     {more, 5+2} = decode_pkt(2,<<0,5,1,2,3,4>>),
   59:     {more, 5+4} = decode_pkt(4,<<0,0,0,5,1,2,3,4>>),
   60: 
   61:     {more, undefined} = decode_pkt(1,<<>>),
   62:     {more, undefined} = decode_pkt(2,<<0>>),
   63:     {more, undefined} = decode_pkt(4,<<0,0,0>>),
   64: 
   65:     Types = [1,2,4,asn1,sunrm,cdr,fcgi,tpkt,ssl_tls],
   66: 
   67:     %% Run tests for different header types and bit offsets.
   68: 
   69:     lists:foreach(fun({Type,Bits})->basic_pack(Type,Packet,Rest,Bits), 
   70:                                     more_length(Type,Packet,Bits) end,
   71:                   [{T,B} || T<-Types, B<-lists:seq(0,32)]),
   72:     ok.
   73: 
   74: basic_pack(Type,Body,Rest,BitOffs) ->
   75:     {Bin,Unpacked,_} = pack(Type,Body,Rest,BitOffs),
   76:     {ok, Unpacked, Rest} = decode_pkt(Type,Bin),
   77:     case Rest of
   78:         <<>> -> ok;
   79:         _ -> 
   80:             <<_:1,NRest/bits>> = Rest,
   81:             basic_pack(Type,Body,NRest,BitOffs)
   82:     end.
   83: 
   84: more_length(Type,Body,BitOffs) ->
   85:     {Bin,_,_} = pack(Type,Body,<<>>,BitOffs),
   86:     HdrSize = byte_size(Bin) - byte_size(Body),
   87:     more_length_do(Type,HdrSize,Bin,byte_size(Bin)).
   88: 
   89: more_length_do(_,_,_,0) ->
   90:     ok;
   91: more_length_do(Type,HdrSize,Bin,Size) ->
   92:     TrySize = (Size*3) div 4,
   93:     NSize = if TrySize < HdrSize -> Size - 1;
   94:                true -> TrySize
   95:             end,
   96:     {B1,_} = split_binary(Bin,NSize),
   97:     {more, Length} = decode_pkt(Type,B1),
   98:     case Length of
   99:         L when L=:=byte_size(Bin) -> ok;
  100:         undefined when NSize<HdrSize -> ok
  101:     end,
  102:     more_length_do(Type,HdrSize,Bin,NSize).
  103: 
  104: 
  105: 
  106: pack(Type,Packet,Rest) ->
  107:     {Bin,Unpacked} = pack(Type,Packet),
  108:     {<<Bin/binary,Rest/bits>>,Unpacked}.
  109: 
  110: %pack(0,B,R,Bits) -> 
  111: %    pack(raw,B,R,Bits);
  112: %pack(raw,Body,Rest,BitOffs) ->
  113: %    Orig = <<0:BitOffs,Body/binary,Rest/bits>>,
  114: %    <<_:BitOffs,Bin/bits>> = Orig,
  115: %    {Bin,<<Bin/binary,Rest/bits>>,Orig};
  116: pack(Type,Body,Rest,BitOffs) ->
  117:     {Packet,Unpacked} = pack(Type,Body),
  118: 
  119:     %% Make Bin a sub-bin with an arbitrary bitoffset within Orig
  120:     Prefix = rand:uniform(1 bsl BitOffs) - 1,
  121:     Orig = <<Prefix:BitOffs,Packet/binary,Rest/bits>>,
  122:     <<_:BitOffs,Bin/bits>> = Orig,
  123:     {Bin,Unpacked,Orig}.
  124: 
  125: pack(1,Bin) ->
  126:     Psz = byte_size(Bin),
  127:     {<<Psz:8,Bin/binary>>, Bin};
  128: pack(2,Bin) ->
  129:     Psz = byte_size(Bin),
  130:     {<<Psz:16,Bin/binary>>, Bin};
  131: pack(4,Bin) ->
  132:     Psz = byte_size(Bin),
  133:     {<<Psz:32,Bin/binary>>, Bin};
  134: pack(asn1,Bin) ->
  135:     Ident = case rand:uniform(3) of
  136:                 1 -> <<17>>;
  137:                 2 -> <<16#1f,16#81,17>>;
  138:                 3 -> <<16#1f,16#81,16#80,16#80,17>>
  139:             end,
  140:     Psz = byte_size(Bin),
  141:     Length = case rand:uniform(4) of
  142:                  1 when Psz < 128 -> 
  143:                      <<Psz:8>>;
  144:                  R when R=<2 andalso Psz < 16#10000 ->
  145:                      <<16#82,Psz:16>>;
  146:                  R when R=<3 andalso Psz < 16#1000000 -> 
  147:                      <<16#83,Psz:24>>;
  148:                  _ when Psz < 16#100000000 ->
  149:                      <<16#84,Psz:32>>
  150:              end,
  151:     Res = <<Ident/binary,Length/binary,Bin/binary>>,
  152:     {Res,Res};
  153: pack(sunrm,Bin) ->
  154:     Psz = byte_size(Bin),
  155:     Res = if Psz < 16#80000000 ->
  156:                  <<Psz:32,Bin/binary>>
  157:           end,
  158:     {Res,Res};
  159: pack(cdr,Bin) ->
  160:     GIOP = <<"GIOP">>,
  161:     Major = rand:uniform(256) - 1,
  162:     Minor = rand:uniform(256) - 1,
  163:     MType = rand:uniform(256) - 1,
  164:     Psz = byte_size(Bin),
  165:     Res = case rand:uniform(2) of
  166:               1 -> <<GIOP/binary,Major:8,Minor:8,0:8,MType:8,Psz:32/big,Bin/binary>>;
  167:               2 -> <<GIOP/binary,Major:8,Minor:8,1:8,MType:8,Psz:32/little,Bin/binary>>
  168:           end,
  169:     {Res,Res};
  170: pack(fcgi,Bin) ->
  171:     Ver = 1,
  172:     Type = rand:uniform(256) - 1,
  173:     Id = rand:uniform(65536) - 1,
  174:     PaddSz = rand:uniform(16) - 1,
  175:     Psz = byte_size(Bin),
  176:     Reserv = rand:uniform(256) - 1,
  177:     Padd = rand:bytes(PaddSz),
  178:     Res = <<Ver:8,Type:8,Id:16,Psz:16/big,PaddSz:8,Reserv:8,Bin/binary>>,
  179:     {<<Res/binary,Padd/binary>>, Res};
  180: pack(tpkt,Bin) ->
  181:     Ver = 3,
  182:     Reserv = rand:uniform(256) - 1,
  183:     Size = byte_size(Bin) + 4,
  184:     Res = <<Ver:8,Reserv:8,Size:16,Bin/binary>>,
  185:     {Res, Res};
  186: pack(ssl_tls,Bin) ->
  187:     Content = case (rand:uniform(256) - 1) of
  188:                   C when C<128 -> C;
  189:                   _ -> v2hello
  190:               end,
  191:     Major = rand:uniform(256) - 1,
  192:     Minor = rand:uniform(256) - 1,
  193:     pack_ssl(Content,Major,Minor,Bin).
  194: 
  195: pack_ssl(Content, Major, Minor, Body) ->
  196:     case Content of
  197:         v2hello ->
  198:             Size = byte_size(Body),
  199:             Res = <<1:1,(Size+3):15, 1:8, Major:8, Minor:8, Body/binary>>,
  200:             C = 22,
  201:             Data = <<1:8, (Size+2):24, Major:8, Minor:8, Body/binary>>;
  202:         C when is_integer(C) ->
  203:             Size = byte_size(Body),
  204:             Res = <<Content:8, Major:8, Minor:8, Size:16, Body/binary>>,
  205:             Data = Body			    
  206:     end,
  207:     {Res, {ssl_tls,[],C,{Major,Minor}, Data}}.
  208: 
  209: 
  210: packet_size(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  211:     Packet = <<101,22,203,54,175>>,
  212:     Rest = <<123,34,0,250>>,
  213: 
  214:     F = fun({Type,Max})->
  215:                 {Bin,Unpacked} = pack(Type,Packet,Rest),
  216:                 case decode_pkt(Type,Bin,[{packet_size,Max}]) of
  217:                     {ok,Unpacked,Rest} when Max=:=0; Max>=byte_size(Packet) ->
  218:                         ok;
  219:                     {error,_} when Max<byte_size(Packet), Max=/=0 ->
  220:                         ok;
  221:                     {error,_} when Type=:=fcgi, Max=/=0 ->
  222:                         %% packet includes random amount of padding
  223:                         ok
  224:                 end
  225:         end,
  226:     lists:foreach(F, [{T,D} || T<-[1,2,4,asn1,sunrm,cdr,fcgi,tpkt,ssl_tls],
  227:                                D<-lists:seq(0, byte_size(Packet)*2)]),
  228: 
  229:     %% Test OTP-8102, "negative" 4-byte sizes.
  230:     lists:foreach(fun(Size) -> 
  231:                           {error,_} = decode_pkt(4,<<Size:32,Packet/binary>>)
  232:                   end, 
  233:                   lists:seq(-10,-1)),
  234: 
  235:     %% Test OTP-9389, long HTTP header lines.
  236:     Opts = [{packet_size, 128}],
  237:     Pkt = list_to_binary(["GET / HTTP/1.1\r\nHost: localhost\r\nLink: /",
  238:                           lists:duplicate(64, $Y), "\r\n\r\n"]),
  239:     <<Pkt1:50/binary, Pkt2/binary>> = Pkt,
  240:     {ok, {http_request,'GET',{abs_path,"/"},{1,1}}, Rest1} =
  241:     erlang:decode_packet(http, Pkt1, Opts),
  242:     {ok, {http_header,_,'Host',_,"localhost"}, Rest2} =
  243:     erlang:decode_packet(httph, Rest1, Opts),
  244:     {more, undefined} = erlang:decode_packet(httph, Rest2, Opts),
  245:     {ok, {http_header,_,"Link",_,_}, _} =
  246:     erlang:decode_packet(httph, list_to_binary([Rest2, Pkt2]), Opts),
  247: 
  248:     Pkt3 = list_to_binary(["GET / HTTP/1.1\r\nHost: localhost\r\nLink: /",
  249:                            lists:duplicate(129, $Y), "\r\n\r\n"]),
  250:     {ok, {http_request,'GET',{abs_path,"/"},{1,1}}, Rest3} =
  251:     erlang:decode_packet(http, Pkt3, Opts),
  252:     {ok, {http_header,_,'Host',_,"localhost"}, Rest4} =
  253:     erlang:decode_packet(httph, Rest3, Opts),
  254:     {error, invalid} = erlang:decode_packet(httph, Rest4, Opts),
  255: 
  256:     ok.
  257: 
  258: 
  259: neg(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  260:     Bin = <<"dummy">>,
  261:     Fun = fun()->dummy end,
  262: 
  263:     BadargF = fun(T,B,Opts)-> {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch decode_pkt(T,B,Opts)) end,
  264: 
  265:     %% Invalid Type args
  266:     lists:foreach(fun(T)-> BadargF(T,Bin,[]) end, 
  267:                   [3,-1,5,2.0,{2},unknown,[],"line",Bin,Fun,self()]),
  268: 
  269:     %% Invalid Bin args
  270:     lists:foreach(fun(B)-> BadargF(0,B,[]) end, 
  271:                   [3,2.0,unknown,[],"Bin",[Bin],{Bin},Fun,self()]),
  272: 
  273:     %% Invalid options
  274:     InvOpts = [2,false,self(),Bin,"Options",Fun,
  275:                packet_size,{packet_size},{packet_size,0,false},
  276:                {packet_size,-1},{packet_size,100.0},{packet_size,false},
  277:                {line_length,-1},{line_length,100.0},{line_length,false}],
  278: 
  279:     lists:foreach(fun(Opt)-> BadargF(0,Bin,Opt),
  280:                              BadargF(0,Bin,[Opt]),
  281:                              BadargF(0,Bin,[Opt,{packet_size,1000}]),
  282:                              BadargF(0,Bin,[{packet_size,1000},Opt]) end,
  283:                   InvOpts),
  284:     ok.
  285: 
  286: 
  287: http(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  288:     <<"foo">> = http_do(http_request("foo")),
  289:     <<" bar">> = http_do(http_request(" bar")),
  290:     <<"Hello!">> = http_do(http_response("Hello!")),
  291: 
  292:     %% Test all known header atoms
  293:     Val = "dummy value",
  294:     ValB = list_to_binary(Val),
  295:     Rest = <<"Rest">>,    
  296:     HdrF = fun(Str,N) ->  
  297:                    StrA = list_to_atom(Str),
  298:                    StrB = list_to_binary(Str),
  299:                    Bin = <<StrB/binary,": ",ValB/binary,"\r\n",Rest/binary>>,
  300:                    {ok, {http_header,N,StrA,Str,Val}, Rest} = decode_pkt(httph,Bin),
  301:                    {ok, {http_header,N,StrA,StrB,ValB}, Rest} = decode_pkt(httph_bin,Bin),
  302:                    N + 1
  303:            end,
  304:     lists:foldl(HdrF, 1, http_hdr_strings()),
  305: 
  306:     %% Test all known method atoms
  307:     MethF = fun(Meth) ->  
  308:                     MethA = list_to_atom(Meth),
  309:                     MethB = list_to_binary(Meth),
  310:                     Bin = <<MethB/binary," /invalid/url HTTP/1.0\r\n",Rest/binary>>,
  311:                     {ok, {http_request,MethA,{abs_path,"/invalid/url"},{1,0}},
  312:                      Rest} = decode_pkt(http,Bin),
  313:                     {ok, {http_request,MethA,{abs_path,<<"/invalid/url">>},{1,0}},
  314:                      Rest} = decode_pkt(http_bin,Bin)
  315:             end,
  316:     lists:foreach(MethF, http_meth_strings()),
  317: 
  318:     %% Test all uri variants    
  319:     UriF = fun({Str,ResL,ResB}) -> 
  320:                    Bin = <<"GET ",(list_to_binary(Str))/binary," HTTP/1.1\r\n",Rest/binary>>,
  321:                    {ok, {http_request, 'GET', ResL, {1,1}}, Rest} = decode_pkt(http,Bin),
  322:                    {ok, {http_request, 'GET', ResB, {1,1}}, Rest} = decode_pkt(http_bin,Bin) 
  323:            end,
  324:     lists:foreach(UriF, http_uri_variants()),
  325: 
  326:     %% Response with empty phrase
  327:     {ok,{http_response,{1,1},200,[]},<<>>} = decode_pkt(http, <<"HTTP/1.1 200\r\n">>, []),
  328:     {ok,{http_response,{1,1},200,<<>>},<<>>} = decode_pkt(http_bin, <<"HTTP/1.1 200\r\n">>, []),
  329: 
  330: 
  331:     %% Test error cases
  332:     {ok,{http_error,"Host\t: localhost:8000\r\n"},<<"a">>} =
  333:         decode_pkt(httph, <<"Host\t: localhost:8000\r\na">>, []),
  334:     {ok,{http_error,"Host : localhost:8000\r\n"},<<"a">>} =
  335:         decode_pkt(httph, <<"Host : localhost:8000\r\na">>, []),
  336:     {ok,{http_error," : localhost:8000\r\n"},<<"a">>} =
  337:         decode_pkt(httph, <<" : localhost:8000\r\na">>, []),
  338:     ok.
  339: 
  340: http_with_bin(http) ->
  341:     http_bin;
  342: http_with_bin(httph) ->
  343:     httph_bin.
  344: 
  345: http_do(Tup) ->
  346:     http_do(Tup,http).
  347: http_do({Bin, []}, _) ->
  348:     Bin;
  349: http_do({Bin,[{_Line,PL,PB}|Tail]}, Type) ->
  350:     {ok, PL, Rest} = decode_pkt(Type,Bin),
  351:     {ok, PB, Rest} = decode_pkt(http_with_bin(Type),Bin),
  352: 
  353:     %% Same tests again but as SubBin
  354:     PreLen = rand:uniform(64),
  355:     Prefix = rand:uniform(1 bsl PreLen) - 1,
  356:     SufLen = rand:uniform(64),
  357:     Suffix = rand:uniform(1 bsl SufLen) - 1,
  358:     Orig = <<Prefix:PreLen, Bin/bits, Suffix:SufLen>>,
  359:     BinLen = bit_size(Bin),
  360:     <<_:PreLen, SubBin:BinLen/bits, _/bits>> = Orig, % Make SubBin
  361:     SubBin = Bin, % just to make sure
  362: 
  363:     {ok, PL, Rest} = decode_pkt(Type,SubBin),
  364:     {ok, PB, Rest} = decode_pkt(http_with_bin(Type),SubBin),
  365:     http_do({Rest, Tail}, httph).
  366: 
  367: http_request(Msg) ->
  368:     QnA = [{"POST /invalid/url HTTP/1.1\r\n",
  369:             {http_request, 'POST', {abs_path,  "/invalid/url"  }, {1,1}},
  370:             {http_request, 'POST', {abs_path,<<"/invalid/url">>}, {1,1}}},
  371:            {"Connection: close\r\n",
  372:             {http_header,2,'Connection',  "Connection"  ,  "close"},
  373:             {http_header,2,'Connection',<<"Connection">>,<<"close">>}},
  374:            {"User-Agent: perl post\r\n",
  375:             {http_header,24,'User-Agent',  "User-Agent"  ,  "perl post"},
  376:             {http_header,24,'User-Agent',<<"User-Agent">>,<<"perl post">>}},
  377:            {"Content-Length: 4\r\n",
  378:             {http_header,38,'Content-Length',  "Content-Length"  ,  "4"},
  379:             {http_header,38,'Content-Length',<<"Content-Length">>,<<"4">>}},
  380:            {"Content-Type: text/xml; charset=utf-8\r\n",
  381:             {http_header,42,'Content-Type',  "Content-Type"  ,  "text/xml; charset=utf-8"},
  382:             {http_header,42,'Content-Type',<<"Content-Type">>,<<"text/xml; charset=utf-8">>}},
  383:            {"Other-Field: with some text\r\n",
  384:             {http_header,0,  "Other-Field"  ,  "Other-Field"  ,  "with some text"},
  385:             {http_header,0,<<"Other-Field">>,<<"Other-Field">>,<<"with some text">>}},
  386:            {"Content--Type: text/xml; charset=utf-8\r\n",
  387:             {http_header,0,  "Content--type"  ,  "Content--Type"  ,  "text/xml; charset=utf-8"},
  388:             {http_header,0,<<"Content--type">>,<<"Content--Type">>,<<"text/xml; charset=utf-8">>}},
  389:            {"Content---Type: text/xml; charset=utf-8\r\n",
  390:             {http_header,0,  "Content---Type"  ,  "Content---Type"  ,  "text/xml; charset=utf-8"},
  391:             {http_header,0,<<"Content---Type">>,<<"Content---Type">>,<<"text/xml; charset=utf-8">>}},
  392:            {"CONTENT-type: text/xml; charset=utf-8\r\n",
  393:             {http_header,42,'Content-Type',  "CONTENT-type"  ,  "text/xml; charset=utf-8"},
  394:             {http_header,42,'Content-Type',<<"CONTENT-type">>,<<"text/xml; charset=utf-8">>}},
  395:            {"OTHER-field: with some text\r\n",
  396:             {http_header,0,  "Other-Field"  ,  "OTHER-field"  ,  "with some text"},
  397:             {http_header,0,<<"Other-Field">>,<<"OTHER-field">>,<<"with some text">>}},
  398:            {"Make-sure-a-LONG-HEaDer-fIeLd-is-fORMATTED-NicelY: with some text\r\n",
  399:             {http_header,0,  "Make-Sure-A-Long-Header-Field-Is-Formatted-Nicely"  ,  "Make-sure-a-LONG-HEaDer-fIeLd-is-fORMATTED-NicelY"  ,  "with some text"},
  400:             {http_header,0,<<"Make-Sure-A-Long-Header-Field-Is-Formatted-Nicely">>,<<"Make-sure-a-LONG-HEaDer-fIeLd-is-fORMATTED-NicelY">>,<<"with some text">>}},
  401:            {"Multi-Line: Once upon a time in a land far far away,\r\n"
  402:             " there lived a princess imprisoned in the highest tower\r\n"
  403:             " of the most haunted castle.\r\n",
  404:             {http_header,0,  "Multi-Line"  ,  "Multi-Line"  ,  "Once upon a time in a land far far away,\r\n there lived a princess imprisoned in the highest tower\r\n of the most haunted castle."},
  405:             {http_header,0,<<"Multi-Line">>,<<"Multi-Line">>,<<"Once upon a time in a land far far away,\r\n there lived a princess imprisoned in the highest tower\r\n of the most haunted castle.">>}},
  406:            {"\r\n",
  407:             http_eoh,
  408:             http_eoh}],
  409:     Bin = lists:foldl(fun({Line,_,_},Acc) -> LineBin = list_to_binary(Line), 
  410:                                              <<Acc/binary,LineBin/binary>> end,
  411:                       <<"">>, QnA),
  412:     MsgBin = list_to_binary(Msg),
  413:     {<<Bin/binary,MsgBin/binary>>, QnA}.
  414: 
  415: 
  416: http_response(Msg) ->
  417:     QnA = [{"HTTP/1.0 404 Object Not Found\r\n",
  418:             {http_response, {1,0}, 404,   "Object Not Found"},
  419:             {http_response, {1,0}, 404, <<"Object Not Found">>}},
  420:            {"Server: inets/4.7.16\r\n",
  421:             {http_header, 30, 'Server',   "Server"  ,   "inets/4.7.16"},
  422:             {http_header, 30, 'Server', <<"Server">>, <<"inets/4.7.16">>}},
  423:            {"Date: Fri, 04 Jul 2008 17:16:22 GMT\r\n",
  424:             {http_header, 3, 'Date',   "Date"  ,   "Fri, 04 Jul 2008 17:16:22 GMT"},
  425:             {http_header, 3, 'Date', <<"Date">>, <<"Fri, 04 Jul 2008 17:16:22 GMT">>}},
  426:            {"Content-Type: text/html\r\n",
  427:             {http_header, 42, 'Content-Type',   "Content-Type"  ,   "text/html"},
  428:             {http_header, 42, 'Content-Type', <<"Content-Type">>, <<"text/html">>}},
  429:            {"Content-Length: 207\r\n",
  430:             {http_header, 38, 'Content-Length',   "Content-Length"  ,   "207"},
  431:             {http_header, 38, 'Content-Length', <<"Content-Length">>, <<"207">>}},
  432:            {"\r\n",
  433:             http_eoh,
  434:             http_eoh}],
  435: 
  436: 
  437: 
  438:     Bin = lists:foldl(fun({Line,_,_},Acc) -> LineBin = list_to_binary(Line), 
  439:                                              <<Acc/binary,LineBin/binary>> end,
  440:                       <<"">>, QnA),
  441:     MsgBin = list_to_binary(Msg),
  442:     {<<Bin/binary,MsgBin/binary>>, QnA}.
  443: 
  444: http_hdr_strings() ->
  445:     %% Must be correct order
  446:     ["Cache-Control","Connection","Date","Pragma","Transfer-Encoding",
  447:      "Upgrade","Via","Accept", "Accept-Charset", "Accept-Encoding",
  448:      "Accept-Language", "Authorization","From","Host","If-Modified-Since",
  449:      "If-Match","If-None-Match","If-Range","If-Unmodified-Since","Max-Forwards",
  450:      "Proxy-Authorization","Range","Referer","User-Agent","Age","Location",
  451:      "Proxy-Authenticate","Public","Retry-After","Server","Vary","Warning",
  452:      "Www-Authenticate","Allow","Content-Base","Content-Encoding",
  453:      "Content-Language","Content-Length","Content-Location","Content-Md5",
  454:      "Content-Range","Content-Type","Etag","Expires","Last-Modified",
  455:      "Accept-Ranges","Set-Cookie","Set-Cookie2","X-Forwarded-For","Cookie",
  456:      "Keep-Alive","Proxy-Connection"].
  457: 
  458: http_meth_strings() ->
  459:     ["OPTIONS", "GET", "HEAD", "POST", "PUT", "DELETE", "TRACE"].
  460: 
  461: http_uri_variants() ->
  462:     [{"*", '*', '*'},
  463:      {"http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986",
  464:       {absoluteURI,http,  "tools.ietf.org",  undefined,  "/html/rfc3986"},
  465:       {absoluteURI,http,<<"tools.ietf.org">>,undefined,<<"/html/rfc3986">>}},
  466:      {"http://otp.ericsson.se:8000/product/internal/",
  467:       {absoluteURI,http,  "otp.ericsson.se"  ,8000,  "/product/internal/"},
  468:       {absoluteURI,http,<<"otp.ericsson.se">>,8000,<<"/product/internal/">>}},
  469:      {"https://example.com:8042/over/there?name=ferret#nose",
  470:       {absoluteURI,https,  "example.com",  8042,  "/over/there?name=ferret#nose"},
  471:       {absoluteURI,https,<<"example.com">>,8042,<<"/over/there?name=ferret#nose">>}},
  472:      {"ftp://cnn.example.com&story=breaking_news@10.0.0.1/top_story.htm",
  473:       {scheme,  "ftp",    "//cnn.example.com&story=breaking_news@10.0.0.1/top_story.htm"},
  474:       {scheme,<<"ftp">>,<<"//cnn.example.com&story=breaking_news@10.0.0.1/top_story.htm">>}},
  475:      {"/some/absolute/path",
  476:       {abs_path,  "/some/absolute/path"},
  477:       {abs_path,<<"/some/absolute/path">>}},
  478:      {"something_else", "something_else", <<"something_else">>}].
  479: 
  480: 
  481: line(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  482:     Text = <<"POST /invalid/url HTTP/1.1\r\n"
  483:              "Connection: close\r\n"
  484:              "Host\t : localhost:8000\r\n"
  485:              "User-Agent: perl post\r\n"
  486:              "Content-Length: 4\r\n"
  487:              "Content-Type: text/xml; charset=utf-8\r\n"
  488:              "Other-Field: with some text\r\n"
  489:              "Multi-Line: Once upon a time in a land far far away,\r\n"
  490:              " there lived a princess imprisoned in the highest tower\r\n"
  491:              " of the most haunted castle.\r\n"
  492:              "\r\nThe residue">>,
  493: 
  494:     lists:foreach(fun(MaxLen) -> line_do(Text,MaxLen) end,
  495:                   [0,7,19,29,37]),
  496:     ok.
  497: 
  498: line_do(Bin,MaxLen) ->
  499:     Res = decode_pkt(line,Bin,[{line_length,MaxLen}]),
  500:     MyRes = decode_line(Bin,MaxLen),
  501:     MyRes = Res,
  502:     case Res of
  503:         {ok,_,Rest} ->
  504:             line_do(Rest,MaxLen);
  505:         {more,undefined} ->
  506:             ok
  507:     end.
  508: 
  509: % Emulates decode_packet(line,Bin,[{line_length,MaxLen}])
  510: decode_line(Bin,MaxLen) ->
  511:     case find_in_binary($\n,Bin) of
  512:         notfound when MaxLen>0 andalso byte_size(Bin) >= MaxLen ->
  513:             {LineB,Rest} = split_binary(Bin,MaxLen),
  514:             {ok,LineB,Rest};
  515:         notfound ->
  516:             {more,undefined};
  517:         Pos when MaxLen>0 andalso Pos > MaxLen ->
  518:             {LineB,Rest} = split_binary(Bin,MaxLen),
  519:             {ok,LineB,Rest};
  520:         Pos ->
  521:             {LineB,Rest} = split_binary(Bin,Pos),
  522:             {ok,LineB,Rest}
  523:     end.
  524: 
  525: find_in_binary(Byte, Bin) ->
  526:     case string:find(Bin, [Byte]) of
  527:         nomatch -> notfound;
  528:         Suffix -> byte_size(Bin) - byte_size(Suffix) + 1
  529:     end.    
  530: 
  531: ssl(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  532:     Major = 34,
  533:     Minor = 17,
  534:     Body = <<234,189,73,199,1,32,4,0,254>>,
  535:     Rest = <<23,123,203,12,234>>,
  536: 
  537:     F = fun(Content) ->
  538:                 {Packet,Unpacked} = pack_ssl(Content, Major, Minor, Body),
  539:                 Bin = <<Packet/binary,Rest/binary>>,
  540:                 {ok, Unpacked, Rest} = decode_pkt(ssl_tls, Bin)
  541:         end,    
  542:     F(25),
  543:     F(v2hello),
  544:     ok.
  545: 
  546: %% Corrupt sub-binary-strings from httph_bin
  547: otp_8536(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  548:     lists:foreach(fun otp_8536_do/1, lists:seq(1,50)),
  549:     ok.
  550: 
  551: otp_8536_do(N) ->
  552:     Data = <<"some data 123">>,
  553:     Letters = <<"bcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba">>,
  554:     <<HdrTail:N/binary,_/binary>> = Letters,
  555:     Hdr = <<$A, HdrTail/binary>>,
  556:     Bin = <<Hdr/binary, ": ", Data/binary, "\r\n\r\n">>,
  557: 
  558:     io:format("Bin='~p'\n",[Bin]),
  559:     {ok,{http_header,0,Hdr2,Hdr2,Data2},<<"\r\n">>} = decode_pkt(httph_bin, Bin,  []),
  560: 
  561:     %% Do something to trash the C-stack, how about another decode_packet:
  562:     decode_pkt(httph_bin,<<Letters/binary, ": ", Data/binary, "\r\n\r\n">>, []),
  563: 
  564:     %% Now check that we got the expected binaries
  565:     {Hdr, Data} = {Hdr2, Data2}.
  566: 
  567: decode_pkt(Type,Bin) ->
  568:     decode_pkt(Type,Bin,[]).		       
  569: decode_pkt(Type,Bin,Opts) ->
  570:     %%io:format("decode_packet(~p,~p,~p)\n",[Type,Bin,Opts]),
  571:     Res = erlang:decode_packet(Type,Bin,Opts),
  572:     %%io:format(" -> ~p\n",[Res]),
  573:     Res.
  574: 
  575: %% Verify line_length works correctly for HTTP headers
  576: otp_9389(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  577:     Opts = [{packet_size, 16384}, {line_length, 3000}],
  578:     Pkt = list_to_binary(["GET / HTTP/1.1\r\nHost: localhost\r\nLink: /",
  579:                           lists:duplicate(8192, $X),
  580:                           "\r\nContent-Length: 0\r\n\r\n"]),
  581:     <<Pkt1:5000/binary, Pkt2/binary>> = Pkt,
  582:     {ok, {http_request,'GET',{abs_path,"/"},{1,1}}, Rest1} =
  583:     erlang:decode_packet(http, Pkt1, Opts),
  584:     {ok, {http_header,_,'Host',_,"localhost"}, Rest2} =
  585:     erlang:decode_packet(httph, Rest1, Opts),
  586:     {more, undefined} = erlang:decode_packet(httph, Rest2, Opts),
  587:     {ok, {http_header,_,"Link",_,Link}, Rest3} =
  588:     erlang:decode_packet(httph, list_to_binary([Rest2, Pkt2]), Opts),
  589:     true = (length(Link) > 8000),
  590:     {ok, {http_header,_,'Content-Length',_,"0"}, <<"\r\n">>} =
  591:     erlang:decode_packet(httph, Rest3, Opts),
  592:     ok.
  593: 
  594: %% Verify packet_size works correctly for line mode
  595: otp_9389_line(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  596:     Opts = [{packet_size, 20}],
  597:     Line1 = <<"0123456789012345678\n">>,
  598:     Line2 = <<"0123456789\n">>,
  599:     Line3 = <<"01234567890123456789\n">>,
  600:     Pkt = list_to_binary([Line1, Line2, Line3]),
  601:     {ok, Line1, Rest1} = erlang:decode_packet(line, Pkt, Opts),
  602:     {ok, Line2, Rest2} = erlang:decode_packet(line, Rest1, Opts),
  603:     {error, invalid} = erlang:decode_packet(line, Rest2, Opts),
  604:     ok.
